attributes.action: Diversity in the United States and the Future of our Children
attributes.background:
The USA comprises of 33% Africans and Hispanics.

Though many advertisements, government media, and shows suggest a future of equality, "brown" or "yellow" people are the minority.

This petition is to give more light into this subject which the US refuses to talk about.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the United States Government and not the UK Government or Parliament.
